question.title: SFTP client with key authentication with passphrase using Apache MINA?
question.body:
I am trying to write an SFTP client using Apache MINA sshd-sftp package. Client should use key authentication and the key is encrypted using a passphrase. The documentation mentions to created key pairs.

KeyPairResourceLoader loader = SecurityUtils.getKeyPairResourceParser();
Collection<KeyPair> keys = loader.loadKeyPairs(null, filePath, passwordProvider);

and set keys in session using

try (ClientSession session = ...estblish initial session...) {
    for (KeyPair kp : keys) {
        session.addKeyIdentity(kp);
    }
    
    session.auth().await(...);
}

For private key files that are encrypted, FilePasswordProvider needs to be passed.

FilePasswordProvider is an interface. How to create FilePasswordProvider?

Thanks
